page.title: 09Serck Audco Valves Factory
page.content: This{factory}is found in Audley Avenue Newport, and this factory has been on this sight since 1869 after the business was started by William Scott Underhill.This company produces a range of valves for the oil and chemical{industries.}The valves are sold to a variety of companies who use them in high tech. processing,basic heating systems etc.The company uses modern methods and{machinery}to produce each valve where years ago six men had to be employed to work on one valve.A valve model takes six weeks of planning before two are put into production.The two most popular valves in 1985 are the Super H tape plug{valve}and the butterfly{valve. }
